      • MAX_CLUSTER_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOST_DEFAULT

        public static final int MAX_CLUSTER_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOST_DEFAULT
        Maximum pooled "cluster" connections per host.

        These connections are mostly idle and only used for DDL operations (like creating keyspaces). Titan doesn't need many of these connections in ordinary operation.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NODE_DISCOVERY_TYPE_DEFAULT

        public static final String NODE_DISCOVERY_TYPE_DEFAULT
        How Astyanax discovers Cassandra cluster nodes. This must be one of the values of the Astyanax NodeDiscoveryType enum.

        Value = "RING_DESCRIBE"

        See Also:

      • CONNECTION_POOL_TYPE_DEFAULT

        public static final String CONNECTION_POOL_TYPE_DEFAULT
        Astyanax's connection pooler implementation. This must be one of the values of the Astyanax ConnectionPoolType enum.

        Value = "TOKEN_AWARE"

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RETRY_POLICY_DEFAULT

        public static final String RETRY_POLICY_DEFAULT
        This must be the fully-qualified classname (i.e. the complete package name, a dot, and then the class name) of an implementation of Astyanax's RetryPolicy interface. This string may be followed by a sequence of integers, separated from the full classname and from each other by commas; in this case, the integers are cast to native Java ints and passed to the class constructor as arguments.

        Value = "com.netflix.astyanax.retry.BoundedExponentialBackoff,25,1000,30"

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
